Package rpgonline.post

A package containing post processing effects for frames.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PostEffect
    A class for managing graphical effects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bloom
    An effect that causes bright areas of the screen to bleed.
    Blur
    A 2 pass gaussian blur effect.
    BrightnessEffect
    An effect that brightens the screen.
    ColorBoostEffect Deprecated
    ColorEffect
    Multiplies the current image by a colour.
    ColorEffectsShader
    A shader that effects the colours on the screen.
    ContrastEffect
    An effect that modifies the contrast of the screen.
    DynamicHeatShader
    A heat shader effect that changes over time.
    DynamicHeatShader2
    A heat shader effect that changes over time that has had the edges fixed.
    EdgeResample Deprecated
    FastBlur
    A fast (but very bad) blur algorithm.
    FragmentExpose
    Provides over exposure effect
    FXAA
    An implementation of FXAA anti-aliasing.
    GammaEffect
    An effect that modifies the gamma of the screen to convert from linear to SRGB values.
    HeatShader
    A shader creating a heat effect.
    HeatShader2
    A shader creating a heat shader that has had the edges fixed.
    HighPass
    A filter that sets all values below a threshold to black.
    HueShiftEffect
    An effect that changes the hue of an image.
    LowExpose
    A low quality but faster over exposure effect.
    MotionBlur
    An effect that provides a motion blur.
    MultiEffect
    Allows for the chaining of multiple effects together.
    NoiseEffect Deprecated
    NullPostProcessEffect
    An effect that does nothing.
    RotateEffect
    An effect that rotates the screen.
    SaturateShader
    An effect that changes the saturation of the screen.
    ScaleEffect
    An effect that scales by a certain amount.
    ShaderEffect
    An effect based on a shader.
    ThemeEffect
    An effect which shifts colors to a consistent palette.
    ToggledEffect
    An effect that can be toggled on and off.
    TransformEffect
    An effect based on a transform.
    VibranceEffect
    An effect that changes the vibrance of the screen.

Package rpgonline.post Description

A package containing post processing effects for frames.
Author:
Tomas
